name: Gotify
natural_language_description: 这是 Gotify 节点。主要用于: Consume Gotify API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

message.name: message
message.description: The message to send, If using Markdown add the Content Type option
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to send, If using Markdown add the Content Type option | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: priority (值: None) - The priority of the message
title (值: None) - The title of the message

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: contentType (值: None) - The message content type

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20
